content.html: Cons of using JSX in VueJS Templates. - It looks foreign to designers - No control structure directives - No more style tags in your single file components - JSX is unpopular in the Vue ecosystem Here's the guide if you wanna try your hands at it. sebastiandedeyne.com/vue-templates-…
content.text:
Cons of using JSX in VueJS Templates.

- It looks foreign to designers
- No control structure directives
- No more style tags in your single file components
- JSX is unpopular in the Vue ecosystem

Here's the guide if you wanna try your hands at it. 

sebastiandedeyne.com/vue-templates-…
